_header: My word is Deo gracias / In world where me be well or woe
_description: A second song of Deo Gracias — six 8-line stanzas, with ‘Deo gracias’ refrain

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
MI Word is Deo graciasIn world wher me be wel or
                    wo…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And afterward in to heuene goÞer to synge Deo gracias.
                    Amen.

                    gracias
